extendedInfo.description: Hedgehog â Lost apples. This is an exciting physical puzzle in which you are challenged to help hedgehog gather all the apples.The game is based on physical laws. You will have to use your wit in order to solve the puzzles of varying complexity on each of the levels.  Make the hedgehog happy by collecting all the apples so that he could feed her cubs during severe winter which is near at hand.What is waiting for you in the game is : -great variety of interesting levels where you can interact with different items -amusing graphic arts and music-game mechanics based on physics -a Hedgehog! Small, spiny, but really funny!
